reviews.review_msg: Awesome prof! The course was distance so no face to face but she was responsive by emails.

Awesome class. She was very engaged and knowledgeable with the topics we discussed (child poverty, welfare policies etc). I went to her office hours  several times to work through ideas for the term paper and found her extremely helpful and constructive in feedback. Show up to class if you want the participation marks.
Took this class distance ed and Rachel was the TA. Not very helpfulclear with expectations, feedback wasn't too great on the two papers.

She is a very nice lady. We said she was talking too fast so she slowed it down after midterm. There was no final exam just a midterm and each days readings must be read before each class because you will have to discuss them and they are very specific. The course was interesting but the material for the first half a tad complicated to understand.
